title: Deprecate vpn resources
body:

Deprecate VPN resources for July. VPN has reached end of life in July....

title: Improvide wait logic for IAM identity template assignments and correct policy refs field mapping
body:
We used retry logic to wait for an async assignment to complete. This logic only waited for an assignment to move into a succeeded state, but would keep retrying even when the state is failed. I've updated so that we will exit the retry when the assignment either succeeds or fails.
